reviews.text: This must be the worst train station in the UK. The bridge doesn't go to platform 4 and there are no signs telling you that. You have to walk to the far end of the platform to find a bridge that will go to platform 4. It's designed to make you miss your train.
It's a great place to visit for shopping or dining out or seeing the theatre or clubbing.

Wolverhampton is boring, there's not a whole lot to do. You can do everything in a day (and not even a full day). It's quite a poor place really. I think more should be done to make it more lively especially for kids as there aren't really and facilities that are catered for them... Not even youth clubs. Crime is quite high here also. The only good thing really is how diverse and multicultural it is I guess?
Nice town centre. Always appears clean and tidy, unlike the suburbs!
Helpful staff but presently a building site whilst the never ending improvements are still on going.
